item.title: Starting coding how to paste stuff in right
item.dc:creator: @dyde08 dyde08
item.description:
@dyde08 wrote:

[quote=“veikron, post:1, topic:221624”]You will probably laugh at this post. because someone is so stupid they cant copy and paste. Well yep thats me. I starter my own server and i can do the easy things ( changing prices spawning locations etc… easy stuff thats just editing) Anyways i have an allstar source, and i want to see how to add things so please without laughing at how new and dumb i am at coding (this is my first post to) please maybe see if you can show me a vid on how to properly paste something in and to know were to put in or something
here is an example of how the source goes

public boolean CheckForSkillUse() { // Use Item On Item
    boolean GoOn = true;

    if (useitems[0] == 946) { // knife
        CheckKnifeUsage();
    } else if (useitems[0] == 1777) { // string
        CheckStringUsage();
    } else if (useitems[0] == 314) { // feathers
        CheckFeatherUsage();
    } else if (useitems[1] == 1019 || useitems[1] == 1021
            || useitems[1] == 1023 || useitems[1] == 1027
            || useitems[1] == 1029 || useitems[1] == 1031
            || useitems[1] == 1007) {
        CheckDyeCape();
    } else if (useitems[0] == 1755) { // chisel
        CheckCuttingGem();
    } else if (useitems[1] == 946 || useitems[1] == 1777
            || useitems[1] == 314 || useitems[1] == 1755
            || useitems[0] == 1019 || useitems[0] == 1021
            || useitems[0] == 1023 || useitems[0] == 1027
            || useitems[0] == 1029 || useitems[0] == 1031
            || useitems[0] == 1007) {
        int temp;

ps grammar sucks i know ill get better thank you :D[/quote]

use insert code on the option things…it has a number symbol…what looks better-

this-

            || useitems[0] == 1029 || useitems[0] == 1031

        int temp;

You will probably laugh at this post. because someone is so stupid they cant copy and paste. Well yep thats me. I starter my own server and i can do the easy things ( changing prices spawning locations etc… easy stuff thats just editing) Anyways i have an allstar source, and i want to see how to add things so please without laughing at how new and dumb i am at coding (this is my first post to) please maybe see if you can show me a vid on how to properly paste something in and to know were to put in or something
here is an example of how the source goes

public boolean CheckForSkillUse() { // Use Item On Item
    boolean GoOn = true;

    if (useitems[0] == 946) { // knife
        CheckKnifeUsage();
    } else if (useitems[0] == 1777) { // string
        CheckStringUsage();
    } else if (useitems[0] == 314) { // feathers
        CheckFeatherUsage();
    } else if (useitems[1] == 1019 || useitems[1] == 1021
            || useitems[1] == 1023 || useitems[1] == 1027
            || useitems[1] == 1029 || useitems[1] == 1031
            || useitems[1] == 1007) {
        CheckDyeCape();
    } else if (useitems[0] == 1755) { // chisel
        CheckCuttingGem();
    } else if (useitems[1] == 946 || useitems[1] == 1777
